page.title: 20FAIRHAM COLLEGE-CLIFTON
page.content: { Fairham Community College}serves the whole of the community in many different aspects.For parents it offers the chance to catch up their education by taking night school or even day classes with older students(6th Form). For the elderly there is a day centre where they are brought by a community services bus.Whilst they are there,they are provided with meals and it also gives them a chance to talk to someone;children from the college also come in and give a hand. { The Peacock Theatre}is a part of the college and stages all productions and some other activities,there is also a {creche}for the young while mothers go to work or do the shopping. Let us not forget that it is still a school and caters for 11-18 year olds.
